statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-2 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 1 , -6 \, x^{3} - x^{2} + x - 1 , 4 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x , -14 \, x^{3} - 22 \, x^{2} - 30 \, x + 3 , -10 \, x^{3} - 10 \, x^{2} - 14 \, x + 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
